title: Metal type?
content: Does anyone know where to purchase new brass type for foil stamping?
author: harveyhoudini

comments.content: Manual or machine stamping? You can get brass type for manual stamping from bookbinding supplies, e.g. [http://www.finecut.co.uk/bookbinding/](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110153533/http:/www.finecut.co.uk/bookbinding/)

You could email [stephensonandblake@btconnect.com](mailto:stephensonandblake@btconnect.com) which is some of the people from the late, lamented Stephenson Blake.   
   
They aren't doing cast stock alphabets, but they do very good CNC machining, we use them for high frequency welding electrodes.   
   
Address your enquiry to Neville Buckle.
